snippet.title: The Nightscarred: Forgotten Gods | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam Now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2427530

Embrace your destiny as the daughter of Erlik, the god of death, in this immersive first-person action game. Craft your own spells, creatively combine them with Nightscarred's hybrid combat system, and assassinate your foes to restore balance in a physics-driven world - solo or in co-op.

Follow us to be the first to hear about updates and get a chance for upcoming private playtest:

Discord: https://discord.gg/6yhHP2e8Jx
X: https://x.com/ShadowfallStud
Instagram: https://instagram.com/shadowfallstud
Facebook: https://facebook.com/shadowfallstud
Website: https://shadowfallstudios.com

𐰼𐰠𐰚-𐰇𐰤
